title: *Update* My name has been reclaimed!!!
body:
Hello everyone, I hope you're all well, even my haters! 

https://imgur.com/a/fk5P2et

I would just like to inform all of you that I have gotten my name back, and I can not thank you enough! Too all the people who supported me, I thank you dearly from the bottom of my heart, for the ones who did not...eh....SUCK IT!!!!! 

I also just wanted to tell you guys, if one person says something from the Riot games support team that makes you feel uncomfortable or does not sound right, make sure you contact another one, request you speak to another worker, everyone has different perspectives and ideas and you should give others a chance to shed some light upon you, NEVER GIVE UP BABES! 

but once again, I truly am thankful, thank you guys! ♡♡♡


_"It's a sin to cover something so perfect."_  {{champion:28}}
